TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PermissionRequestEvidence extends System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase
Public NotInheritable Class PermissionRequestEvidence Inherits EvidenceBase
public ref class PermissionRequestEvidence sealed : System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase

summary.span: 定义表示权限请求的证据。

span.span: Defines evidence that represents permission requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限请求包括所需的最低代码运行，则代码可以使用它们在授予的权限所需的权限但不是必需的和代码显式请求权限不才能被授予。Permission requests include the minimum permissions the code requires to run, permissions the code can use if they are granted, but are not required, and permissions the code explicitly asks not to be granted.

MemberSignature.Value: public PermissionRequestEvidence (System.Security.PermissionSet request, System.Security.PermissionSet optional, System.Security.PermissionSet denied);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.PermissionSet request, class System.Security.PermissionSet optional, class System.Security.PermissionSet denied) cil managed

public: PermissionRequestEvidence(System::Security::PermissionSet ^ request, System::Security::PermissionSet ^ optional, System::Security::PermissionSet ^ denied);

param.name: request
param.span: 代码运行所需的最小权限。

span.span: The minimum permissions the code requires to run.

param.name: optional
param.span: （如果授予）代码可以使用的（但不是必需的）权限。

span.span: The permissions the code can use if they are granted, but that are not required.

param.name: denied
param.span: 代码明确请求不要授予的权限。

span.span: The permissions the code explicitly asks not to be granted.

summary.span: 用代码程序集的权限请求初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the permission request of a code assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 安全策略系统使用以及代码程序集的请求的权限以确定代码应授予的权限。The .NET Framework security policy system uses the requested permissions along with a code assembly's to determine which permissions the code should be granted.
